name: Hydrochloric Acid (1M)
safetyInfo: Corrosive. Use in fume hood. Wear gloves and eye protection.

name: Sodium Hydroxide Pellets
safetyInfo: Highly corrosive. Causes severe burns. Wear full PPE.

name: Acetone
safetyInfo: Highly flammable. Keep away from ignition sources. Use in well-ventilated area.

name: Methanol
safetyInfo: Flammable and toxic. Avoid inhalation and skin contact. Use in fume hood.

name: Glass Beakers (250ml)
safetyInfo: Handle with care to avoid breakage.

name: Erlenmeyer Flasks (500ml)
safetyInfo: Handle with care to avoid breakage.

name: Safety Goggles
safetyInfo: Wear to protect eyes from splashes and projectiles.
